# HKMetadataKeyHeartRateMotionContext

**Global Variable**

The user’s activity level when the heart rate sample was measured.

## Declaration

```swift
let HKMetadataKeyHeartRateMotionContext: String
```

## Discussion

This key takes an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] containing an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKHeartRateMotionContext] as its value.

## Valid Motion Contexts

- **HKHeartRateMotionContext**: Values that indicate the user’s level of activity when the heart rate sample was measured.

## Related Documentation

- **heartRate**: A quantity sample type that measures the user’s heart rate.

## Metadata Keys

- **HKMetadataKeyHeartRateSensorLocation**: The location where a specific heart rate reading was taken.
